member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE
member.summary: Defines the coordinate system for a collection of snap points.

summary.para: Snap points are specified relative to the top and left boundaries of the content unless DIRECTMANIPULATION_COORDINATE_MIRRORED is also specified, in which case they are relative to the bottom and right boundaries of the content. For zoom, the boundary is 1.0f.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_COORDINATE_ORIGIN
member.summary: Snap points are specified relative to the origin of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_COORDINATE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_COORDINATE_MIRRORED
member.summary: Snap points are interpreted as specified in the negative direction of the origin. The origin is shifted to the bottom and right of the viewport or content. Cannot be set for zoom.
